content: Prayer for Rescue from Enemies.
For the music director;  Al-tashheth. A Mikhtam of David, when Saul sent  and they watched the house in order to kill him.
Set me  on high away from those who rise up against me.
Rescue me from those who practice injustice,
And save me from men of bloodshed.
For behold, they have set an ambush for my life;
Fierce men attack me,
Not for my wrongdoing nor for my sin, ,
For no guilt , they run and take their stand against me.
Stir Yourself to help me, and see!
You,  God of armies, the God of Israel,
Awake to punish all the nations;
Do not be gracious to any  deal treacherously in wrongdoing.
They return at evening, they howl like a dog,
And prowl around the city.
Behold, they gush forth with their mouths;
Swords are in their lips,
For, , “Who hears?”
But You, , laugh at them;
You scoff at all the nations.
